# Field Inspection Video Transcript

Use this transcript when the lab mentions observing inspectors.

## Scene 1 · Morning Route (00:00–02:30)
- Inspector switches between paper route sheet and tablet strapped to arm.
- Bright sunlight washes out the screen until shade is found.
- Gloves cause two missed taps on the map.

## Scene 2 · Midday Update (02:30–05:10)
- Tablet loses LTE signal; inspector dictates notes into phone recorder.
- Uses stylus to draw pothole shape but lag introduces errors.
- Coordinator over radio asks for status; inspector repeats data already entered.

## Scene 3 · Evening Wrap (05:10–07:00)
- Inspectors sit in vehicle to finalize reports.
- Battery at 12%; they share portable charger.
- Submit step fails once due to VPN timeout, requiring re-entry.
